name: commits_over_time_tool
description: Visualizes the number of commits added to the project. Commits are counted relative to a user-selected time window.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping commits (Day, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'M'

name: pull_requests_over_time_tool
description: Visualizes PR behavior by tracking Created, Merged, and Closed-Not-Merged PRs over time. Also shows Created PR count as a trend over lifespan.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping PRs (Day, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'M'

name: pull_request_review_status_counts_tool
description: Visualizes the number of assigned and unassigned pull requests in each time bucket.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping PRs (Trend, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'W'

bot_switch.description: Whether to include bot activity in the visualization. Default: true

name: pull_request_conversation_engagement_tool
description: Tracks the number of PRs that are open on a given day vs. those that have received a comment or a review within a time interval, or that are waiting on a response from the opener.

num_days.description: Number of days to consider for response time analysis. Default: 2

bot_switch.description: Whether to include bot activity in the visualization. Default: true

name: pull_request_first_response_tool
description: Compares the volume of PRs being opened against the number of those PRs that receive at least one response within the parameterized timeframe after being opened.

num_days.description: Number of days to consider for first response time analysis. Default: 2

bot_switch.description: Whether to include bot activity in the visualization. Default: true

name: pull_request_activity_staleness_tool
description: Visualizes growth of Open Pull Request backlog. Differentiates sub-populations of PRs by their 'Staleness'. Please see the definition of 'Staleness' on the Info page.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping PRs (Day, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'M'

staling_interval.description: Number of days until a PR is considered staling. Default: 7

stale_interval.description: Number of days until a PR is considered stale. Default: 30

name: contributor_issue_assignment_tool
description: Visualizes the number of assigned and unassigned issues in each time bucket.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping issues (Trend, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'W'

bot_switch.description: Whether to include bot activity in the visualization. Default: true

name: issue_activity_staleness_tool
description: Visualizes growth of Issue backlog. Differentiates sub-populations of issues by their 'Staleness'. Please see the definition of 'Staleness' on the Info page.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping issues (Day, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'M'

staling_interval.description: Number of days until an issue is considered staling. Default: 7

stale_interval.description: Number of days until an issue is considered stale. Default: 30

name: issues_over_time_tool
description: Visualizes the activity of issues being Opened and Closed partitioned by time-window. Also shows the total volume of Open issues over time.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping issues (Day, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'M'

start_date.description: Start date for the analysis in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default: 2 years ago

end_date.description: End date for the analysis in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default: None (use all data up to present)

name: contributor_pull_request_review_assignment_tool
description: Visualizes number of pull request reviews assigned to each contributor in the specified time bucket. The visualization only includes contributors that meet the user inputted assignment criteria.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping PRs (Trend, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'W'

assign_req.description: Total number of assignments required for a contributor to be included. Default: 10

start_date.description: Start date for the analysis in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default: 2 years ago

end_date.description: End date for the analysis in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default: None (use all data up to present)

bot_switch.description: Whether to include bot activity in the visualization. Default: true

name: contributor_issue_assignment_tool
description: Visualizes number of issues assigned to each contributor in the specified time bucket. The visualization only includes contributors that meet the user inputted assignment criteria.

interval.description: Time interval for grouping issues (Trend, Week, Month, Year). Default: 'W'

assign_req.description: Total number of assignments required for a contributor to be included. Default: 10

start_date.description: Start date for the analysis in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default: 2 years ago

end_date.description: End date for the analysis in YYYY-MM-DD format. Default: None (use all data up to present)

bot_switch.description: Whether to include bot activity in the visualization. Default: true
